original_title: Nature as a Metaphor for Economic, Emotional and Existential Horror
overview: An expanded text piece which considers humanâ€™s press against (alienation from?) the natural world.  An installation utilizing words as sculptural elements to contemplate the morphological state of language and nature. the way each need endlessly change and evolve. The way we use each. discard and re-invent each.  A philosophical treatise which tries to understand the word nature.
title: Nature as a Metaphor for Economic, Emotional and Existential Horror
